Headline: #4 Cottage Grove Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cottage Grove/75th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood and South Chicago: due to, street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 76th, Greenwood, South Chicago and over regular route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/75th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #82 Kimball/Homan Temporary Reroute at Lawndale/26th
ShortDescription: 82 Kimball/Homan buses are rerouted via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#82 Kimball/Homan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Lawndale, 26th, Central Park, 31st, then resume their normal route on Homan due to street blockage near Lawndale/26th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
